customhtml2.customHTML: Find out where we came from, where we're going, and what makes Altra different.

content.subheadingContent: Altra was born in the back of a running store. The rest is history.

overlayImage.altText: blurred image of a person running uphill

content.subheadingContent: Natural Fit is the secret sauce in all Altra shoes.

overlayImage.altText: two people running in the twilight over an illuminated town

content.subheadingContent: What keeps Altra going? Keeping you going.
Always striving to expand and nurture the Altra running community.
Altra Athletes amaze, inspire, and persevere on the road and trail.

overlayImage.altText: woman running across the finish line

content.subheadingContent: Stay informed and motivated with the latest community news and athlete updates.

Altra Running started with one pair of trail shoes, designed for comfort and technical terrain. From this first design, the core of Altra’s unique comfort was born: FootShape™ and Balanced Cushioning™. From this first audacious and innovative shoe, Altra has continued to break the mold in the industry with top-of-the-line trail running shoes, road running shoes, and hiking shoes made for every runner, every mile, and every terrain.
